mapper.select: select a.ask_no, a.ask_title, a.ask_content, a.ask_date, a.userNo, m.nickName from ask a, member m where a.userNo = m.userNo order by ask_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into ask_comment(ask_comment_no, ask_no, ask_comment_content) values(seq_ask_comment.nextval, #{ask_no}, #{ask_comment_content})
mapper.select: select FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, USERNO, FREE_DATE, FREE_COUNT from free_board order by free_no desc
